entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Android x64: runtime tests failing - `The following constructor parameters did not have matching fixture data: _Global globalVar` #59679
  • System.Text.Json failing some large file tests #59678
  • The 'new' modifier doesn't always work with [JsonIgnore] #59675
  • `AssemblyName.CodeBase` stripped from `AssemblyName` before going to Resolving event handler #59669
    7.0.0
  • JIT: libraries PGO runtime assert #59668
  • JIT: libraries PGO tests time out #59667
    7.0.0
  • JIT: Libraries PGO assert during find loops #59666
    7.0.0
  • JIT: Libraries Regex PGO tests failing with assert #59665
    7.0.0
  • ComWrappers: are there any (Roslyn) Source Generators planned? #59651
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: An API to optimally encapsulate several searching algorithms and techniques, using one simple class #59649
  • IHost.RunAsync() never completes via pm2 start and stop. #59644
  • [Performance Proposal] Use SIMDJson in Corehost #59642
  • Redundant info is shown in dotnet –info if install .NET 6.0.100-rc.2.21473.26 SDK on Windows #59659
  • .NET 5.0.5 SortedSet(IComparer).GetViewBetween(X,Y).Max returns invalid value #59640
  • SemaphoreSlim.WaitAsync(CancellationToken) is not cancelled when SemaphoreSlim.Dispose invoked immediately after CancellationTokenSource.Cancel #59639
  • X509Store.Add pops up a dialog, fails on OneCore system #59638
    Future
  • Embedded markdown readme for NuGet packages #59630
  • Augment Regex extensibility point for better perf and span-based matching #59629
    7.0.0
  • Test failure System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.Tests.RevocationTests.DynamicRevocationTests.RevokeIntermediateWithInvalidRevocationName(pkiOptions: AllRevocation | IssuerAuthorityHasDesignatedOcspResponder) #59627

Closed

  • hacked by john in my iphone #59677
  • Many installer tests are failing because of Directory.Build.props file is missing #38530
    7.0.0
  • System.Speech.Tests fail GrammarBuilder test on non-English OS #59400
    Future
  • System.Text.Json: make not-generic JsonConverter constructor public #59493
  • NLS vs ICU difference in invariant case changing of title case characters. #59661
  • `System.Version` can't be Json-deserialized #59632
  • dotnet/runtime and dotnet/emsdk fail to build stable for .NET 6 #57982
    6.0.0
  • System.Collections - Undoc 6.0 APIs #58661
    Future
  • Alpine docker image does not obey local timezone anymore #59636
  • emsdk failure: emcmake not found #59556
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Dependency Injection SAVE_ASSEMBLIES code clean up #59684
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • Enable running analyzers on DllImportGenerator and Microsoft.Interop.SourceGeneration #59683
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • fix few more QUIC tests that can hang #59682
    area-System.Net
  • Using optimized ILGenerator.Emit function in Dependency Injection #59680
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution
  • Fix race condition in ServiceProcess tests #59676
    area-System.ServiceProcess
  • Add PEM exports to certificates #59674
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Issue 55685 processname optimisation #59672
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Build improvements based on feedback #59671
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Prefer readonlyspan properties over readonly array fields #59670
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger] Don't print error message when Browser is closed while debugging #59664
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Fix for GitHub issue #59432 and the corresponding regression test #59663
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Several improvements to regex source generator #59660
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.0
  • Dllimport generator build and test fixes #59658
    * NO MERGE *, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Antigen: Change Antigen's helixqueue to public #59657
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • delay locking in `ConcurrentDictionary.GrowTable` until necessary #59656
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • [draft][wasm] More typescript conversion #59655
    arch-wasm, 7.0.0
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1387932 #59652
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Turn on XHarness telemetry for mono runtime tests #59646
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Clean up fix for single-reg returned normalize-on-load vars #59645
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [WIP] Test the newest Arcade #59643
    area-Infrastructure-libraries

Merged

  • Skip ExportPkcs7_Empty test on mobile platforms #59626
    area-System.Security
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1388320 #59662
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/6.0] Add InstallLocation component to host #59654
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-installer
  • Add checking SpeechRecognitionEngine Culture to GrammarBuilder test #59516
    area-System.Speech, community-contribution
  • forward-port from `release/6.0-rc2`: MonoAOTCompiler: detect when nothing has changed, a… #59597
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Change loop cloning condition blocks flow graph #59233
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add superpmi.exe option to break to the debugger on exception. #59234
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Update area-owners.md to account for pod change #59635
    area-Meta
  • Change channel passed to ci_setup to track runtime branch #59071
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add InstallLocation component to host #59537
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • Write SPMI download progress in MB #59647
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add the argument checks to Unix-part of Mutex.OpenExistingWorker #59634
    area-System.Runtime
  • [mono] Improve Makefile's dotnet.js dependencies #59603
    area-Build-mono
  • [wasm] introduce typescript modules #59392
    arch-wasm, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] windows: Fail the build if provisioning fails #59560
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Pipeline to run Exploratory fuzzing tool to catch codegen issues #59489
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Remove invalid test exclusions. #59608
    area-Infrastructure-libraries

Updated

  • Support fast tailcalls in R2R #56669
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fewer AddressExposedReason::TOO_CONSERVATIVE #59429
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Leverage `cwde` and `cdqe` for sign extensions on xarch #56172
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Update ELT profiler tests to include tests when a function returns HFA/HVA struct on Arm64 #54912
    arch-arm64, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Dependency Injection support for ValueTypes as Services #59625
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Build improvements based on feedback #59391
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • WIP: Cleanup of runtime test build scripts #58762
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Wasm marshaler API for user-defined types; migrate Uri and DateTime to new API #47640
    arch-wasm, area-Interop-mono
  • [mono][jit] Eliminate some type comparisons in gshared methods. #59543
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [resubmit] BigInteger parsing optimization for large decimal string #55121
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Fix setting creation date for OSX-like platforms #49555
    area-System.IO, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Fix incorrect tracking of sign bit #59525
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Add IAsyncEnumerable support to TransformManyBlock #49264
    area-System.Threading.Tasks, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Skip eventpipe_readevents for arm32 #58545
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Stop retyping RHSes to byrefs on type mismatch #58297
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [System.Private.CoreLib] Additional trimming for EventSource.IsSupported feature switch #56564
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, linkable-framework, community-contribution
  • Refactoring XslCompiledTransform #59475
    area-System.Xml
  • Reduce allocations in VersionConverter #55564
    area-System.Text.Json, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Add tizen armel build CI for pull request #56281
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Conditionally build tests, using the conds on which we submit tests to Helix #58511
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Src gen: use GetBestTypeByMetadataName instead of GetTypeByMetadataName #59092
    6.0.0
  • Refactoring XmlReader{Async} #59337
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Enable AOT, and Wasm.Build.Tests on windows #58578
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • JIT: allow suppressing some dumps or parts of dumps #59299
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Universal arm crossgen compiler #58279
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Prevent cache from being resized #59607
    area-Extensions-Caching, community-contribution
  • Change hosted pool #57785
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Check Options validations length instead of null #58157
    area-Extensions-Options, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0-rc2' => 'release/6.0' #59387
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Remove redundant checks #59310
    area-Extensions-Caching, community-contribution
  • Remove _validator field from ObjectCollection #59589
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • Process: throw ArgumentNullException when ArgumentList contains a null. #59562
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution
  • [WIP] Enable runtime tests to run on Android arm32 #51642
    os-android, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • removed argument requestId from loopbackserver.cs #58678
    area-System.Net
  • DependencyContextWriter.WritePortableTarget(): write the duplicate key name when duplicate keys are detected #57860
    area-DependencyModel, needs author feedback, 7.0.0
  • Improve SortedSet DeepCopy performance #56561
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [JIT] Optimization for left-shift operator #52297
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, needs author feedback, community-contribution
  • stress test sandboxing #57653
    * NO MERGE *, NO REVIEW
  • Cleanup XPath.StringToDouble #55867
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Nullable annotation for System.Windows.Extensions #57896
    area-Microsoft.Win32, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • WIP: Initial implementation of JIT assembly name helpers #48578
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, 6.0.0
  • [Group 2] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.Abstractions` #57401
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Arm: Include BBJ_ALWAYS blocks in dominance calculation #59376
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use cmakedefine in eglib config #59623
    community-contribution
  • Integrate changes from NativeAOT branch #59510
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
